power.title: Great Cleave
power.fluff: The numbers arrayed against you mean nothing as your weapon swings in a great arc, stopped by nothing so trivial as flesh and bone

element.name: Target:
element.text: Each creature in the burst

element.name: Attack:
element.text: Strength vs. AC

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, plus an additional +1 damage for each enemy adjacent to you.

element.name: Miss:
element.text: Your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.

power.title: Avalanche Strike
power.fluff: You drop your guard and put all your strength into a devastating overhead swing

element.name: Target:
element.text: One creature

element.name: Attack:
element.text: Strength vs. AC

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

element.name: Rageblood Vigor:
element.text: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

element.name: Whirling Slayer:
element.text: The attack deals 2[W] (main) + 2[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage instead.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the start of your next turn, attack rolls against your AC or Reflex gain a +4 bonus.

power.title: Resurgent Strike
power.fluff: You slash, the violence rejuvenating you

element.name: Target:
element.text: One creature

element.name: Attack:
element.text: Strength vs. AC

element.name: Hit:
element.text: You either gain 5 + your Constitution modifier temporary hit points, or end one effect on yourself.
The target takes 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

element.name: Miss:
element.text: If you are bloodied, you can reroll the attack once.

power.title: Bloodletting
power.fluff: Your powerful attack is meant to finish off a wounded foe

element.name: Target:
element.text: One creature

element.name: Attack:
element.text: Strength vs. AC

element.name: Rageblood Vigor:
element.text: If the target is bloodied, the attack targets Fortitude instead

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If the target is bloodied, the attack deals +1[W] damage.

element.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
element.text: If this attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points or less, allies within 5 squares of you gain a bonus to their next damage roll before the end of your next turn. This bonus is equal to one-half your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Vault the Fallen
power.fluff: You leap from one foe to the next, leaving blood in your wake

element.name: Primary Target:
element.text: One creature

element.name: Primary Attack:
element.text: Strength vs. AC

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier + 1d6 damage.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You shift 2 squares. You must end this shift within reach of an enemy other than the primary target.
If you shifted, make a secondary attack.

element.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
element.text: The number of squares you can shift equals your Charisma modifier.

element.name: Whirling Slayer:
element.text: The number of squares you can shift equals your Dexterity modifier.

If you end the shift within reach of two enemies other than the primary target, you can make the secondary attack against both, using your main weapon for one attack and your off-hand weapon for the other.

element.name: Secondary Target:
element.text: One creature other than the primary target

element.name: Secondary Attack:
element.text: Strength vs. AC

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier + 1d6 damage.

element.name: Rageblood Vigor:
element.text: If the primary attack bloodied or reduced the target to 0 or less hit points, the secondary attack deals additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
